TopicTitle: KerbQuake Maintainer [Edit: delete me before my shame is known]

Articles.Content:
Edit: I am a moron who hasn't played 1.0 yet and didn't realize this is now stock

my apologies for taking your time

KerbQuake

This wonderful mod hasn't been updated since .25 and it really adds a great level of immersion to IVA missions and once you have played with it it is painful to not use it

So I would like to formally request for a skilled plugin developer to pick this mod up, please

I suspect there will need to be major changes to the code to get it working in 1.0 as it references atmospheric things for a lot of the shaking. Also comparability with nuFAR, RealChutes and DRE would (for me at least) be a must have.

The current version worked ok in .90 but it had some reported issues with RealChutes, also for me it had a major bug when using unmanned vessels, NRE spam that would crash the game, however I believe it was a plugin conflict as it didn't happen on a stock install, however I have yet to track down which dll was causing the conflict (heavily modded install).

Edited May 6, 2015 by Akira_R
But it's now more less stock has it.

yep if you look at the cfg think it this line 

EngineType = LiquidFuel

		// Possible EngineType values:
		// Generic, SolidBooster, LiquidFuel, Piston, Turbine, ScramJet, Electric, Nuclear, MonoProp
		EngineType = SolidBooster

And this one gives you the launch smoke 

	MODULE
	{
		name = ModuleSurfaceFX
		thrustProviderModuleIndex = 0
		fxMax = 0.75
		maxDistance = 50
		falloff = 1.8
		thrustTransformName = thrustTransform
	}
